src_original: imasmiṃ vā loke parasmiṃ vā punaḥ  svargeṣu vā yaṃ ratanaṃ praṇītaṃ /
tgt_original: imasmiṁ vā loke parasmiṁ vā punaḥ

src_original: yo āryasatyāni sudeśitāni  gambhīra-arthāni avetya paśyati /  idaṃ pi saṃghe ratanaṃ praṇītaṃ
tgt_original: yo āryasatyāni sudeśitāni  gambhīrārthāni athetya paśyati |

src_original: gambhīraprajñena sudeśitāni /  kiṃ cāpi te bhonti bhṛśaṃ pramattā
tgt_original: gambhīraprajñena sudeśitāni |  kiṁcāpi te bhonti bhṛśaṁ pramattā

src_original: ye yuktayogī manasā succhandasā  naiṣkramyiṇo gautamaśāsanasmiṃ /
idaṃ pi saṃghe ratanaṃ praṇītaṃ  etena satyena susvasti bhotu
tgt_original: etena satyena susvasti bhotu  manuṣyato vā amanuṣyato vā ||11 ||

src_original: te kṣīṇabījā avirūḍhidharmā  nirvānti dhīrā yatha tailadīpā /
tgt_original: te kṣīṇabījā avirūḍhidharmā  nirvānti dhīrā yatha tailadīpā |

src_original: agnir yathā prajvalito niṣīde  indhanakṣayā śāmyati vegajāto /
tgt_original: agniryathā prajvalito niṣīde  indhanakṣayā śāmyati vegajāto |

src_original: divaṃ cā rātriṃ ca haranti vo baliṃ /
tgt_original: divaṁ ca rātriṁ ca haranti vo baliṁ |

src_original: [_Mvu_1.295_] vāḍhaṃ pi taṃ rakṣayantu ca karontu
tgt_original: vāḍhaṁ pi taṁ rakṣayantu ca karontu

src_original: etādṛśaṃ devamanuṣyaśreṣṭhaṃ  buddhaṃ namasyāmi susvasti bhotu /
tgt_original: etādṛśaṁ devamanuṣyaśreṣṭhaṁ  buddhaṁ namasyāmi susvasti bhotu |
dharmaṁ namasyāmi susvasti bhotu  saṁghaṁ namasyāmi susvasti bhotu
